overview: Zeal. A living, breathing act of defiance against the cynicism and jadedness that too easily passes as critical thinking, in our age, in our church, and in our hearts. This documentary explores the creation process, from the emotions and moments, to the sounds and studio sessions that shaped the 2019 album, ZEAL. Join Chad and the colorful cast of characters that make up the Kings Kaleidoscope family on their journey to rediscover childlike faith.
title: The Adventures of Zeal
